title: decent editor, but changes file permissions
comment: This is a great text editor with a critical flaw. It changes the permissions of files you edit. It can change the owner, group and bits. Combined with root access (which this editor supports), this can brick or destroy your device. For example you edit a system file as root, the contents are correct but this editor changes the file permissions so the system can't use it. Your device just bricked. Use with caution.

title: My preferred text editor on Android
comment: I collect text editors, and look at a lot of them.  This is my current pick on Android.  I like the tabbed interface and the syntax highlighting.  I haven't tried to edit really large files, so I don't know how it behaves with those.  I use it with an external keyboard.   The one bit I miss is being able to use Ctrl-arrow keys to move by word in a file.  With my Logitech Portable keyboard plugged in,  Alt-Home and End go to start and end of like, and Alt-PgUp/PgDn go to start and end of file, but Ctrl-key combos aren't seen.  (It works as expected in DroidEdit, so it's an app limitation.)  It would be nice to be able to show/hide the toolbar, and opening files from the toolbar by touching the Folder icon is inconsistent - works fine if I move the cursor up to the toolbar and press enter, or use a mouse, but doesn't seem to always see a screen touch,  The app hasn't been updated in a while, so I don't know if it's still developed/supported, but what's there generally works well and does what I need.

Thanks for this, UI is great, will donate!

title: Perfect
comment: Main things i like about this app - character box, quick preview button for HTML, easy text zooming, text highlighting, auto text wrapping. title: Fantastic App
comment: This is really a fantastic app. It is the only "do it all" text editor. As an example, you can open an html file and edit it (which is nothing to brag about here), and you can directly preview it in Dolphin or Firefox. Jota is very nice, but it doesn't have this feature. I use touch vim a lot. Sometimes I prefer to use that one if I am editing a LaTeX or html file if I don't have a mouse. But with a mouse, this editor is my choice for just about all text based files.

title: The BEST PHP editor there
comment: Having tried all the free PHP editors out there, I've come to the conclusion that the 920 editor has the best features relating to website coding (at least backend). This editor has everything you'd expect from a web editor, including syntax highlighting, auto-indent, and easy save features. Others may have more extensive highlighting, or FTP built in, but they don't have the full package this one does provided you're happy with using a different FTP program.

title: Sluggish...
comment: Unfortunately seems to have become incredibly slow in the most recent versions, to the point that the text input lags my typing so much that the I/O buffer overflows and half of what I typed is lost, leaving a horrible mess of jibberish in it's wake. Even tried turning off syntax highlighting to see if it was struggling there but it made no difference.  Having to constantly wait for the text input to catch up makes this app useless to me. For reference, I had a single tab open and am using a Transformer Prime (with dock) so it's not as if my device itself it too slow!  Would love to continue using this app but the performance issues need to be fixed...

title: Best Android text editor!
comment: This is by far the best text editor I have used for android. I use it on my phone and on my tablet. It is so awesome on the tablet with a keyboard and stylus. I have come to prefer my tablet over my laptop in part due solely to this app.
Select text doesn't work

title: Piece of crap.
comment: Can't open any files after installing on my galaxy nexus ice cream sandwich. Tried uninstalling and installing twice and still could not open any txt file.

title: feature request
comment: most excellent editor. wish you could change colour of the tabs/top so it matches the text field.

title: Buggy
comment: Cursor in ICS jumps around during selection which makes it difficult to select certain text. System file didn't save even the app said succeeded in root mode. Needs an option to mount system as r/w because some app will remount as r/o

title: Poorly written
comment: A simple app such as a text editor should never run as slowly as this one does.  This can only mean that it has been written inefficiently.  In any case, it reminds me of Beverly Hills 90210, so there's no way I could use it.
Really like this and only just opened it. There is not a function to allow you to increase the text on the screen.

title: Excellent
comment: User-friendly, Many languages and rich with Encoding ways

title: Promete muito e cumpre pouco
comment: Realmente lê, grava e compartilha arquivo.txt - MAS - as ícones do menu "Abrir", "Salvar" e "Desfazer", são muito pequenas e horríveis de utilizar em celular. 2: Gravei um texto com acentuação em português (Pt-Br) e não apareceu quando reabri. Chequei as opções, tem várias codificações igual criar sites. Tem uma opção "Automático" que entende ERRADO. Tentei 10 codificações, deram todas errado (sem acentos). E ao abrir, pergunta novamente, e dá errado novamente. Preciso marcar como 1 estrela, para baixar esta nota. Apagarei muito em breve, quando encontrar outro que cumpra o que promete.

title: Used to work...
comment: Worked at first, even as root, but was broken a month or so ago by an update and still did not work when last I checked (fails to save, even as a normal user). Uninstalled.

title: Great editor
comment: Handles everything well. Never have any real problems

title: Very cool
comment: Like it to edit / review my sources on the go

title: Powerful text editor like NoteTab on PC
comment: I was looking for a notepad/text editor that could handle large files and open them regardless of having a .txt suffix.  After trying many of the notepad apps and finding them wanting (many had freeze/lockup problems), I tried 920 Text Editor, mainly for the tabs feature and its similarity to a PC program known as NoteTab (by Fookes Software).  This app not only took all I could throw at it without locking up, its clean interface and root access made it a joy to use.  I will definitely donate!
good

title: Epic
comment: Love it, really simple and easy to use, quick and just really good visually as well.

comment: The scroll its a pain in the.... the same with the saving file process

title: built for productivity
comment: I use this editor for daily development on my phones, and have tried many, many others. It has lots of nice touches.

title: the best
comment: very good development editor very smooth and responsible,  i hope in the future there will be the autocomplete feature

title: Best android text program
comment: I barely started to use this program: text 920, and so far it is the best program I've used in android. I have used some paid text editor programs, but this one I really recommend it. It is so simple that anyone can use without a problem.

title: works great!
comment: does exactly what it claims. helped me fix a client site in a bind, while waiting for food at a restaurant.

title: great
comment: good experience.

title: Very good
comment: This is really a very good text editor I ever found on the play store. What I need is all here.

title: Cool editor
comment: Nice and clean UI also easy to use. I've tried to.open and edit php file and its works fine. Syntax highlighting is very helpful. Thanks. Keep up good works :-)

title: Good

title: The best - simple as that
comment: Stunningly good app. Syntax highlighting, auto indentation, clean interface and super responsive, even on a Wildfire. The last text editor you'll ever install.

title: Nice
comment: Just downloaded it and played with it a bit. Seems pretty good. We'll see when I put it through its paces at work on Monday. First text editor I've seen that might give Jota Text Editor a run for its money.

title: Great app.

title: Amazingly Great Editor!
comment: Great html editor! Fixed all the older bugs. New version is great! Packed with All the general features as well as useful revolutionary features like multiple tabs. Well this app really worth the donation.

title: It's is Gpl baby!
comment: I use this is a note taker with "agrep" for search . all it needs is a share menu and theming. To paste you may need to press and hold the handle

title: Start at line 10 for landscape
comment: In landscape start at line 10 otherwise code disappears when keyboard is showing. Means I can finish working on code when on the train! Would be good to have shortcut keyboard popup when needed in landscape without having to minimise keyboard. Good job, and free! HTC Sensation.

title: I REALLY wanted to Like This
comment: But was dissapointed right away. I started a new text and wanted to paste the contents of an email into it but there was no way to paste. Held down on page, no paste option appeared. The keyboard wouldn't even pop open unless I tapped text area a few times :-(

title: Awesome
comment: This guy really did a great job in developing this app. I love it

title: Looks Promising
comment: I've been looking at simple editors with syntax highlighting and this looks the best so far, but using ICS on the transformer prime, i can't access the lower menu to alter settings or do search and replace etc. Bit of  a limitation at mo.

title: Excelente
comment: App muy bueno con colores de sintaxis.

title: Fantastic
comment: This is a really good text editor. Most intuitive editor of them all. Thanks

title: MS.
comment: Please add ability to edit system files (for rooted phones) and i will pay for this app.

title: Best multi syntax editor, but.....
comment: Couple of issues that would greatly improve program. 1st needs to have support for physical keyboard (Asus Prime), pressing enter on physical keyboard starts new doc instead of doing a CR. 2nd, auto syntax detection would put this over the edge..... Update physical keyboard now works fine since update, very impressed with developer response to comments, keep your eye on this app it's really shaping up to be very special.

title: Was Great
comment: Was great, I've been using this for a while now for programming on the go, I've had no problems until i updated it this morning. I saw multi-tabs and was so excited because I've wanted multitabs, only to find out i couldn't use the program at all. if i move the cursor with arrow keys it dissapears and reappears at the top of the file. i can't even make one edit, i can't do anything right now.  i hope this is fixed soon...

title: Upgraded to 4 stars
comment: This software is really good. If all goes well, I'll give it 5 stars next month.

title: Good work

title: Yes.
comment: Best text editor I have ever used! Thank you!

title: AWESOME!
comment: Lightweight, has everything you need & nothing you don't. Handles large programs with ease!

title: Best editor
comment: This editor is simple,and very effective.  It has a great symbol window that can be left open while working. Comes up as a choice for code file editing from Dropbox where others don't.

title: Supports Arabic..welcome
comment: Nice app. But it becomes slow with large txt files, and might stop responding with files over 100kb. Fix that.
This is the first editor that doesn't freeze up when I load very large files to edit. I love it!

title: Barely works.
comment: I don't see a caret on my TP with ICS. That's probably the worst no-go for me. Also the GUI is freaking horrible to work with - I wish it would resemble a desktop editor more (like Notepad++). Also elementary keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+S, Ctrl+O) don't work.

title: Good simple editor!
comment: There was a bug in this app that it wouldnt read in php files I had that were bigger than a few 100 lines.  However that now seems fixed since very late 2011.  So I'm all happy!  If this editor now got some ftp functions it would definitely be the best html web developers tool on Android.   Please please pretty please, is this possible?
great app!!!

title: Good, but with open file issue
comment: Like the syntax highlighting , very good editor overall. Would rate higher if it could open file directly from file manager, Open as... text. The editor opens but doesn't load the file.

title: Limited file size!
comment: Can't load the entire contents of a big .as file. Kind of annoying...

comment: File browser doesn't work. App doesn't register its intents to open any of its supported file types.
